item.title: Computer Networking Top Down Approach
item.author: Septemus
item.description: Note I made this note based on Computer Networking A Top-Down Approach Seventh Edition. Warning The note is made for the sole purpose of reviewing what i learned and understood from the book.Some statements and descryptions might be subjective and incorrect.If you have doubts please leave comments or contact me. Chapter 1 Computer Networks and the Internet End systems are connected together by a network of communication links and packet switches.
